SEARCH
Module io.github.ascopes.jct
Package io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers.impl

Class LoggingFileManagerProxy

java.lang.Object
io.github.ascopes.jct.compilers.impl.LoggingFileManagerProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
InvocationHandler
@API(since="0.0.1", status=INTERNAL) public final class LoggingFileManagerProxy extends Object implements InvocationHandler
A proxy that wraps a JctFileManager in a proxy that can log all interactions with the JavaFileManager, along with a corresponding stacktrace.

This is useful for diagnosing difficult-to-find errors being produced by javac during testing, however, it may produce a hefty performance overhead when in use.

All logs are emitted with the INFO logging level.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Ashley Scopes

    • wrap

      public static @WillNotClose JctFileManager wrap(@WillCloseWhenClosed @WillCloseWhenClosed JctFileManager manager, boolean stackTraces)
      Wrap the given JctFileManager in a proxy that logs any calls.
      Parameters:
      manager - the manager to wrap.
      stackTraces - true to dump stacktraces on each interception, or false to omit them.

      the proxy JctFileManager to use.
